title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2511/83 of 7 September 1983 derogating from Regulation (EEC) No 2835/77 laying down detailed rules with respect to aid for durum wheat and amending that Regulation
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2511/83
of 7 September 1983
derogating from Regulation (EEC) No 2835/77 laying down detailed rules with respect to aid for durum wheat and amending that Regulation
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: By way of derogation from Article 6 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 2835/77, for the 1982/83 marketing year, Greece shall pay by 1 November 1983 at the latest the amount of 12,77 ECU by which the aid provided for in Article 1 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1456/82 (5), was increased by Regulation (EEC) No 1821/83.
In Article 6 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 2835/77, '1 August' is hereby replaced by '1 July'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 September 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 281, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 164, 14. 6. 1982, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 180, 5. 7. 1983, p. 4.
(4) OJ No L 327, 20. 12. 1977, p. 9.
(5) OJ No L 164, 14. 6. 1982, p. 18.
